LanguageData.Dragonian_Female.label: 龙女
LanguageData.Dragonian_Female.description: 一种美丽的半爬行生物，拥有神话中龙的特征和人类的特征，因为其丝滑的银色头发而在黑市上高价交易，经常被当做偷猎者的目标。
LanguageData.Dragonian_Female.tools.0.label: 牙齿
LanguageData.Dragonian_Female.tools.1.label: 左臂
LanguageData.Dragonian_Female.tools.2.label: 右臂
LanguageData.Dragonian_Female.tools.3.label: 尾巴

LanguageData.Dragonian_Male.tools.0.label: 牙齿
LanguageData.Dragonian_Male.tools.1.label: 左臂
LanguageData.Dragonian_Male.tools.2.label: 右臂
